title: Mark of the Guardian Icon
body:
It's been well over a week since I took the quiz, and I've seen people say that you just need to wait for it. 
But I haven't gotten it at all lol.. I got the World's Pick'em Poro Icon tho

replies.body:
As long as you were logged in while taking the quiz, you'll be fine.  It can take a few days to arrive, and some may get it before others.  You can verify your account will be receiving it through a notification after retaking the quiz (imaged below).  The goodies will come!
http://imgur.com/a/j9YGM

I have taken the quiz on 3 of my accounts  and  got {{champion:99}} but have not got it yet. It's been about a week and I just want to know how the progress is going.
Mr butter pimp , Mr oxy trojan, Digital dreams.
